alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 4:05AM PST until March 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions, including during the morning commute on Friday. Tree branches could fall as well. Snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches above 7500 feet, 8 to 12 inches from 6500 feet to 7500 feet, 4 to 8 inches from 5500 to 6500 feet, and 2 to 4 inches from 4000 to 5500 feet are expected. * WHERE...Above 5500 feet through Friday evening, then above 4000 feet. * WHEN...Midnight to 10 PM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
